thought: To craft a bowl, I need to place dark_oak_planks in slots 1, 3, 5, and 7 of the crafting grid. I will start by moving the dark_oak_planks from slot 19 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1
